com.nokia.maps.map

Interface MapComponent

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    KMLMapComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractButtonComponent, AbstractMapComponent, CenteringComponent, ContextMenuComponent, FocalObserverComponent, GestureLongTouch, ImageButton, InfoBubbleComponent, LongTouchComponent, PinchZoomComponent, RestrictMapComponent, TextButton, TimerLongTouch, TooltipComponent, TouchComponent, VisibleTouchComponent

    public interface MapComponent
    This interface is used to extend the functionality of the basic map. This allows users of the API to:
    • include new functionality,
    • replace existing functionality with a different implementation,
    • deactivate existing functionality.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attach(MapDisplay map)
      This method is called whenever the MapComponent is attached to a MapDisplay
      void detach(MapDisplay map)
      This method is invoked when the MapComponent is detached from a map.
      EventListener getEventListener()
      This method retrieves the EventListener instance if one exists.

      This method retrieves a unique identifier of the MapComponent.
      java.lang.String getVersion()
      This method retrieves the version of the MapComponent.
      void mapUpdated(boolean zoomChanged)
      This method is called when attached MapDisplay state changes.
      void paint(javax.microedition.lcdui.Graphics g)
      This method renders the MapComponent using the Graphics object.

    • Method Detail

      • getId

        java.lang.String getId()
        This method retrieves a unique identifier of the MapComponent. It is prohibited to add multiple MapComponents with the same id to a map.
        Returns:
        The unique identifier of the plugin

      • getVersion

        java.lang.String getVersion()
        This method retrieves the version of the MapComponent.
        Returns:
        The version of the plugin

      • attach

        void attach(MapDisplay map)
        This method is called whenever the MapComponent is attached to a MapDisplay
        Parameters:
        map - the MapDisplay the component is currently attached to.

      • detach

        void detach(MapDisplay map)
        This method is invoked when the MapComponent is detached from a map.
        Parameters:
        map - the map that this component is no longer attached to.

      • paint

        void paint(javax.microedition.lcdui.Graphics g)
        This method renders the MapComponent using the Graphics object. The graphics object must not be stored for later use and may only be used within the scope of this paint() method. All MapComponent.paint() operations are done after the base map has been rendered. The graphics object is not clipped and rendering is done to whole area of the rendering target.
        Parameters:
        g - the graphics object used for rendering

      • mapUpdated

        void mapUpdated(boolean zoomChanged)
        This method is called when attached MapDisplay state changes.
        Parameters:
        zoomChanged - true if the zoom level has changed

      • getEventListener

        EventListener getEventListener()
        This method retrieves the EventListener instance if one exists.
        Returns:
        The event listener associated with this MapComponent or null if events are not needed.
